original_title: Tai Chi: Revitalizing the Body, Mind and Spirit Through an Ancient Chinese Martial Art - A Day at the Spa Collection
overview: This program has been designed as a first step towards discovering the many benefits of Tai Chi, exploring its physical movements and deep-seated philosophy that can improve everyone's quality of life.
title: Tai Chi: Revitalizing the Body, Mind and Spirit Through an Ancient Chinese Martial Art - A Day at the Spa Collection
